oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tate Spring
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Tate Spring East Tenn. The Carlsbad of America. Stephens Litho. & Eng. Co., St. Louis. Bird's eye view of this celebrated resort open throughout the year. Thos. Tomlinson, Owner-Proprietor. Electric Lights. Steam Heat. Modern System Water Works. Write for 40-page annual, free. Depot one mile from Hotel on K. & B. R.R. 40 miles east of Knoxville on Southern Railway. Tate Spring, E. Tenn., Oct. 25th, 1901. Etching of grounds and building on card.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hotels; Springs; Resorts; Advertisements;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For information on license and use fees and acquiring high-resolution image files, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814.
